price: Pa zar smo prilikom prvog stvaranja malaksali? Ne, ali oni u ponovno stvaranje sumnjaju.
arabic: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلۡخَلۡقِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي لَبۡسٖ مِّنۡ خَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: afaʿayīnā bil-khalqi al-awali bal hum fī labsin min khalqin jadīdin
